name: Fruit Paste Bait
desc:
A very commonly-seen bait made from mashing, fermenting, and kneading Sunsettias and Wheat together. It atomizes very quickly upon hitting the water and exerts an incredible attraction on small fish. Due to the ease of its making, cheap price, and its excellent efficacy, it has also been jokingly called the "Fisher's Trusty Treasure."

Suitable for catching Medakas, Dawncatchers, and Crystalfish.

customize.name: Fruit Paste Bait

customize.name: Sunsettia
customize.desc: A plump fruit, beautiful like the sunset, that is abundant across all of Teyvat. It has a curious, sweet aroma and is able to energize an individual.

customize.name: Wheat
customize.desc: Golden, sun-kissed tassels. Needs to be ground down to flour for further use.

customize.name: Formula: Fruit Paste Bait
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step formula for making Fruit Paste Bait.

customize.name: Nantuck
customize.desc: A senior fisherman in the Mondstadt Fishing Association and a soon-to-be famous sea-life author. He guarantees that his story about a heroic fisherman pursuing a giant black whale will be a literary success once published.
